title: Elmo takes a turn as a therapist after asking 'How is everybody doing?'
description: When the beloved red Muppet asked people how they were doing, they responded with honesty — and in some cases, despair. Elmo replied to many messages with encouragement and empathy.

title: As she leaves DOJ, associate AG recalls the cases that will 'stick with me forever'
description: Vanita Gupta has been the first woman of color to serve as associate attorney general. It's a job with a huge portfolio that ranges from civil rights to immigration to abortion.
